Articles.Content: I'm pretty sure that most of you people have thought about this, and probably want it as well. Then you can set up colonies with friends, and blow up enemy ships. It would be great for videos, even on a small scale (LAN networks) and would make the game 5 times more awesome! One problem though. there is one aspect of the game that you can't really play without. An aspect that cant work in a multiplayer environment. It is the time warps. They let you fast forward through the year long journeys the kerbanoughts make. It is essential for the game and prevents multiplayer from existing. I opened this thread to discus possible solutions. I hope to get some good ideas from this. if we get a good one, we can tell the Squad about it. I'm sure they want it as much as we do. Please tell me anything you got. I'm all ears.
All Solutions have already been discussed to death and no viable Solution has been found.
